moreInfo.title: About Game
moreInfo.item:
Coming Summer 2009!

The World of Cars Online is a 3D online world based on the hit movie, CARS. Get ready for an amazing ride into this wacky world full of fun and adventure. The only difference is – YOU are the Car! Design your car, become a racing legend, or just make new friends. Play tons of mini-games with Lightning McQueen and the awesome cast of CARS. Now’s your chance to create, race, and play in the World of Cars Online!

  • Create Your Car: Pick the body style, color, wheels, and name … there’s a gazillion ways to totally trick out your ride.

  • Race for the Cup: Start on local dirt tracks and work your way up to the national circuit to become a Piston Cup Champ.

  • Explore the Open Road: Start in Radiator Springs, and drive beyond Carburetor County to explore a whole new world of snow racing, dune jumping, and beach wheelies.

  • Build Your Own Race Track and Garage: Expand and decorate your Garage. Build your own racetracks and invite friends over to race on it!

  • Play Fun Mini-Games: There are awesome mini-games like tow truck driving (Mater’s favorite), tractor tipping, stunt shows, and lots more!

  • Cool Car Add-Ons: Earn coins to upgrade your Car with new paint colors, spoilers, rims, fins, bigger engines, and loads more one-of-a-kind items.

  • Make New Friends: Meet and chat with Mater, Guido, and Luigi, and other wacky characters from the movie as well as thousands of other players just like you!

  • Become a Legend: Steer your way to earning fans, sponsors, and winning the Piston Cup, joining Doc, Lightning McQueen, and other elite racers!
